artist.name: Efterklang & The Danish National Chamber Orchestra

bio.summary: Efterklang is a band from Copenhagen, Denmark, consisting of four core members (Mads Brauer, Casper Clausen, Thomas Husmer & Rasmus Stolberg) who have played together since 2001. They are often joined by musicians like Peter Broderick, Frederik Teige, Heather Broderick and Niklas Antonson when they perform live and they also have a 5th member (Rune Mølgaard) who has been a part of Efterklang since the beginning, but who has taken a more secluded role in the past years. The Springer EP was originally released in a limited edition of 500 handmade covers in white fake fur.
bio.content: Efterklang is a band from Copenhagen, Denmark, consisting of four core members (Mads Brauer, Casper Clausen, Thomas Husmer & Rasmus Stolberg) who have played together since 2001. They are often joined by musicians like Peter Broderick, Frederik Teige, Heather Broderick and Niklas Antonson when they perform live and they also have a 5th member (Rune Mølgaard) who has been a part of Efterklang since the beginning, but who has taken a more secluded role in the past years. The Springer EP was originally released in a limited edition of 500 handmade covers in white fake fur. While printing the numbered Under Giant Trees EP Efterklang decided to store the first twenty copies as a collectors object. Unfortunately these were stolen. As a countermove 29 copies was stamped with a letter which were sold by auction at EBay and the profit was given to the environmental organization Nepenthes to protect the rain forest. Efterklang are signed to the British Leaf Label. Besides Efterklang, they also run the record label Rumraket. Efterklang signed with 4AD on the 2nd of September. This does not mean that they are cutting all ties to their previous home, The Leaf Label. On October 19th 2009 they will release Performing Parades by Efterklang & The Danish National Chamber Orchestra on CD/DVD & LP/DVD. Records: Springer EP 2003 Rumraket/2005 The Leaf Label Tripper LP 2004 The Leaf Label Under Giant Trees EP 2007 The Leaf Label Parades LP 2007 The Leaf Label Performing Parades LP&DVD The Leaf Label User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
